frontmatter.title: The Good News I was Talking About

node.excerpt: I got promoted! I was a chubby kid. When I look back at photos when I was 2 to 5 years old, I'm usually mid-chew or holding something half eaten. Food was my friend! And other people let me know that food was my friend, comments about my size, my rolls, my chins, all that. I don't think I ever registered what that…
